description: Standing established - concrete injury in fact
facts: Environmental group's members use a river for recreation
Factory discharged pollutants into the river
Pollution caused fish die-offs affecting fishing
Members can no longer fish at their usual spots
Environmental group sues factory under Clean Water Act
asp_facts: claim(c1). claim_type(c1, standing). plaintiff(c1, environmental_group). defendant(c1, factory). injury_in_fact(c1, yes). injury_concrete(c1, yes). injury_particularized(c1, yes). causation_traceable(c1, yes). redressability(c1, yes). statutory_basis(c1, clean_water_act).
question: Does the environmental group have standing to sue?
rationale: Standing requires injury in fact (members cannot fish), causation (traceable to factory's pollution), and redressability (injunction would stop pollution). The injury is concrete and particularized to the members.
